participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and motivated, Ethan loves exploring the outdoors and challenging himself.
participant_1.background: my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer. i have a black lab named trooper. i like to go hiking in the spring.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and disciplined, Liam dedicates his life to service and helping others.
participant_2.background: i'm ex military. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month. i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard.
